name: One Time Swipe
description:
Take part in the Annual Two Minute Swipe event, where contestants from across to world can test their abilities to swipe special One Time Use cards.  You have only two minutes to swipe as many cards as you can! They're hidden everywhere, in your desk drawer, under potted plants, in the trash can, slipped into folders, and even in your coffee mug.  Can you find and swipe all 50 of them before time runs out? 

Made in 7 days for the VR Jam 2022

*Also, if the drawer physics break on you, I'm sorry. It turns out Unity's Configurable Joints sometimes just don't. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
